TopicTitle: No Plume Or Sound To My SpaceX Engines.

Articles.Content:
So I recently got the Tundra Exploration pack which gives me a ton of SpaceX things but when i made a Falcon 9 crew dragon even though i launched it and the rocket was rising into the air there was no sound and no plume it looked stationary?

is there any reason that this is happening and how can i fix it?
how did you install the mod? CKAN? or other places? what was the mod version? can i see your gamedata folder?

This happens with un modded game too. See Bug 28280 on the Squad Bugtracker. This is a bug and Squad confirmed it. I am assuming they plan to fix it. 

Edited July 13, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal
